amendatorysection.catchline: Cost of patient care; relatives; limitation.
amendatorysection.para: The liability of each relative, except a spouse, shall cease when relatives shall have completed payments assessed pursuant to sections 83-227.01, 83-227.02, 83-350, and 83-363 to 83-380 for one hundred eighty months, or when the patient attains the age of majority, whichever shall occur first.
